GSILib.connect

Interface HumanRecGateway

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicBusinessSystem, PublicHumanRecGw

    public interface HumanRecGateway
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface represents the access HR people has to the BusinessSystem.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean addWorker(Journalist jn)
      Adds a new worker to the System
      java.lang.Boolean addWorker(Photographer pg)
      Adds a new worker to the System
      java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Journalist jn)
      Updates the information about a worker to the system.
      java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Photographer pg)
      Updates the information about a worker to the system.

    • Method Detail

      • addWorker

        java.lang.Boolean addWorker(Journalist jn)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a new worker to the System
        Parameters:
        jn - The new journalist
        Returns:
        Boolean if and only if it could be added and did not exist in the system before.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • addWorker

        java.lang.Boolean addWorker(Photographer pg)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a new worker to the System
        Parameters:
        pg - The new journalist
        Returns:
        Boolean if and only if it could be added and did not exist in the system before.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • updateWorker

        java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Journalist jn)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates the information about a worker to the system. The journalist with the same ID is replaced by the new one, although it remains author of his pictures, etc.
        Parameters:
        jn - The new version of the journalist
        Returns:
        Boolean True if and only if the journalist existed in the system before and could be replaced.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • updateWorker

        java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Photographer pg)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates the information about a worker to the system. The photographer with the same ID is replaced by the new one, although it remains author of his pictures, etc.
        Parameters:
        pg - The new version of the photographer
        Returns:
        Boolean True if and only if the photographer existed in the system before and could be replaced.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.
